testcase.name: User successfully punch in & punch out
testcase.system-out: Given 8User on homepage with authorization using "Admin" as username & "s3Kol4HQA!*" as password.passed When User click time button & click attendance button & click punch in button.passed And User input "on time" as punchInNote & click punch in button.............passed Then User succesfully punch in..............................................passed Then User input "return" as punchOutNote & click punch out button...........passed Then User succesfully punch out.............................................passed
